title: How to Make an Instant Mixed Vegetable Chutney in Kashmiri Style

steps.headline: Add grated radish into a bowl.
Add slices of cabbage into it.
Add chopped slices of onions into it.
Add Kashmiri red chili powder into it.
Mix all of them thoroughly with the help of a spoon.
Serve it with lunch or dinner or with different varieties of snacks.

text: Add grated radish into a bowl.  Add grated carrot into it.  Add slices of cabbage into it.  Add chopped slices of onions into it.  Add salt into it.  Add Kashmiri red chili powder into it.  Add lemon juice into it.  Mix all of them thoroughly with the help of a spoon.  Serve it with lunch or dinner or with different varieties of snacks.
